types.html:
Kaboulien m (plural Kabouliens, feminine Kaboulienne)

  1. Kabuli, a resident or native of the Afghan city of Kabul
    Hypernym: Afghan
    • 2020 January 16, Sonia Ghezali, “Sur les réseaux sociaux, les Kabouliens crient leur ras-le-bol de l’insécurité [Kabulis take to social media to cry out that they are fed up with insecurity.]”, in Radio France Internationale:
      Sur les réseaux sociaux, les Kabouliens racontent eux comment ils ont dû modifier leur habitudes.
      On social media, Kabulis tell how they've had to change their habits.

Related terms

[edit]
  • kaboulien
trans: Kabuli, a resident or native of the Afghan city of Kabul

title: Kaboulien
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ka.bu.ljɛ̃/
